subject: Baseball
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: After five games with the Yankees, David Adams, who came up through the team’s minor-league system, was hitting .333 and had his first major league home run in Monday’s victory.
snippet: After five games with the Yankees, David Adams, who came up through the team’s minor-league system, was hitting .333 and had his first major league home run in Monday’s victory.
